criterion: Mentions that a cough in an infant is a common symptom of pneumonia.
Provides clear and concise information about the signs of pneumonia in infants.
Does not suggest over-the-counter medication for pneumonia treatment.
Does not provide overly complicated medical jargon or technical terms.
Provides guidance on when to seek medical attention for a cough in an infant.
Does not mention self-diagnosis or self-treatment for pneumonia.
Does not use overly formal or professional tone.
Provides general information about the symptoms of pneumonia in infants.
Does not provide outdated or incorrect information about pneumonia treatment.
Does not ask the user to seek medical attention unnecessarily.
